title: London/City of London
name: Polo Bar
content: An unpretentious cafe serving fried breakfasts and similar basic food 24h a day, and a great place for a late snack after you leave the Eat & Drink. Liverpool St is a safe area anyway but you cannot get safer than this for a late night meal, as at night you'll often see police from the nearby City of London police station. There are no toilets, however, so you need to use those at nearby Liverpool St Station.
